text: The men's mass start race of the 2014–15 ISU Speed Skating World Cup 7, arranged in the Gunda Niemann-Stirnemann-Halle in Erfurt, Germany, was held on 22 March 2015. ==Results== The race took place on Sunday, 22 March, scheduled in the afternoon session, at 16:46. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" ! colspan=4 | !! colspan=5 | Race points !! colspan=3 | |- !
